entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with a few wet flurries near midnight. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level 1000 metres. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
